Espeon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0195: Quagsire
Pokémon
#0197: Umbreon →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Espeon (TCG Pocket).

Espeon has been featured on 27 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Discovery expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Espeon cards are normally Psychic-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Espeon

Espeon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
